str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A kernel, grain, seed. Apparently a primary word; a kernel of seed.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From speiro; something sown, i.e. Seed; by implication, offspring; specially, a remnant.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
